SEARCH
Module ex6
Package ex6

Class ParallelAgent

java.lang.Object
ex6.ParallelAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Agent
public class ParallelAgent extends Object implements Agent
The ParallelAgent class wraps an Agent to enable asynchronous message processing. It uses a blocking queue to hold messages and a separate thread to process them.
